together \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w their|strong="H4886"\w* grain \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w drink|strong="H5262"\w* \w offerings|strong="H4503"\w*—\w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* \w of|strong="H4503"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w cakes|strong="H2471"\w* made \w from|strong="H8081"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mixed|strong="H1101"\w* \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w wafers|strong="H7550"\w* coated \w with|strong="H1101"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Nazirite|strong="H5139"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w separation|strong="H5145"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w addition|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* whatever \w else|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w afford|strong="H3027"\w*; \w he|strong="H3651"\w* must \w fulfill|strong="H6213"\w* whatever \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w makes|strong="H6213"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w separation|strong="H5145"\w*.” Aaron’s Blessing
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1288"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*: \w This|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* how \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w*:
